mapper.update: insert into income_budget_month(contract_id, `budget`, `month`, quarter, `year`, `time`, handler,single, `type`) values (#{map.contract_id}, #{map.budget}, #{map.month}, #{map.quarter}, #{map.year}, now(), #{userId}, #{map.single}, #{map.type}) on duplicate key update `budget` = values(`budget`), `time` = values(`time`), `handler` = values(`handler`)

insert into income_budget_year(contract_id, `year_budget`, quarter1_budget,quarter2_budget, quarter3_budget, quarter4_budget, `year`, `time`, handler) values (#{map.contract_id}, #{map.year_budget}, #{map.quarter1}, #{map.quarter2}, #{map.quarter3}, #{map.quarter4}, #{map.year}, now(), #{userId}) on duplicate key update `year_budget` = values(`year_budget`), `quarter1_budget` = values(`quarter1_budget`), `quarter2_budget` = values(`quarter2_budget`), `quarter3_budget` = values(`quarter3_budget`), `quarter4_budget` = values(`quarter4_budget`), `time` = values(`time`), `handler` = values(`handler`)
mapper.select: SELECT b.`budget`, b.`month`, b.`quarter`, b.`year`, b.single, i.income, b.`type` FROM income_budget_month b LEFT JOIN income i ON b.`contract_id` = i.`contract_id` AND b.`year` = i.`year` AND b.`month` = i.`month` AND b.single = i.single and b.`type` = i.`type` WHERE b.contract_id = #{contract_id} AND b.`year` = #{year} ORDER BY b.`month`

select ifnull(`year_budget`,0) as year_budget, ifnull(quarter1_budget,0) as quarter1_budget, ifnull(quarter2_budget,0) as quarter2_budget, ifnull(quarter3_budget,0) as quarter3_budget, ifnull(quarter4_budget,0) as quarter4_budget, `year`, contract_id from income_budget_year where contract_id= #{contract_id} and `year` = #{year}

select c.id, y.year_budget, y.quarter1_budget, y.quarter2_budget, y.quarter3_budget, y.quarter4_budget, q.quarter_budget, q.month1_budget, q.month2_budget, q.month3_budget, m.budget from contract c LEFT JOIN income_budget_year y on c.id = y.contract_id AND y.`year` = 2023 LEFT JOIN income_budget_quarter q on c.id = q.contract_id AND q.`year` = 2023 AND `quarter` = 2 LEFT JOIN income_budget_month m on c.id = m.contract_id AND m.`year` = 2023 and m.`month` = 5 WHERE c.id = '630EC0CF-5756-4BC8-BD03-5522A936188E'
